The proposed English translation "Judge, preservated things and consisting of the keyboard" is far from conveying the same meaning as the original sentence inRomanian, which actually means "Jugdment, by which [He/She] preserves things and in which [the/a] mystery consists "

The word "keyboard" in the English version is a mistranslation of the word "taiet" which is closer in meaning to "mystery or secret " in this context. The grammatical structure of the sentence is also not well reflected, with the word order being inverted for no clear reason and leading to confusion. Additionally, pronouncing who is doing the preserving in the original sentence is not reflected in the English version.
'
